statements: SELECT * FROM reorder_points;
SELECT product_id, reorder_point FROM reorder_points WHERE reorder_point > 50;
SELECT product_id, lead_time, demand_variability FROM reorder_points ORDER BY demand_variability DESC;
SELECT * FROM reorder_points WHERE lead_time < 5 AND reorder_point IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(lead_time) AS average_lead_time FROM reorder_points;
SELECT * FROM reorder_points WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, reorder_point FROM reorder_points WHERE lead_time >= 5 ORDER BY demand_variability DESC;
SELECT MAX(reorder_point) AS max_reorder_point, MIN(reorder_point) AS min_reorder_point FROM reorder_points;
SELECT product_id, lead_time, demand_variability, reorder_point FROM reorder_points WHERE demand_variability > 0.5 AND reorder_point IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lead_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM reorder_points WHERE reorder_point >= 10;
SELECT * FROM ReorderPoints WHERE ProductID = 1;
SELECT ProductID, DemandVariability FROM ReorderPoints ORDER BY LeadTime DESC;
SELECT ProductID, LeadTime FROM ReorderPoints WHERE DemandVariability > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE ReorderPoint > 10 ORDER BY AvailableQuantity ASC;
SELECT ProductID, AvailableQuantity FROM Inventory WHERE AvailableQuantity < ReorderPoint;
SELECT * FROM ReorderPoints WHERE DemandVariability > 0.5 ORDER BY ProductID DESC;
SELECT ProductID, LeadTime FROM ReorderPoints WHERE LeadTime BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT Inventory.ProductID, Inventory.AvailableQuantity, ReorderPoints.LeadTime FROM Inventory INNER JOIN ReorderPoints ON Inventory.ProductID = ReorderPoints.ProductID;
SELECT MIN(ReorderPoint) AS MinReorderPoint, MAX(AvailableQuantity) AS MaxAvailableQuantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT AVG(DemandVariability) AS AvgDemandVariability, COUNT(*) AS TotalProducts FROM ReorderPoints;
SELECT * FROM reorder_points;
SELECT product_id, reorder_point FROM reorder_points WHERE reorder_point > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, reorder_point, lead_time FROM reorder_points WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT product_id, reorder_point FROM reorder_points WHERE lead_time > 3 AND demand_variability < 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, order_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT order_id, product_name, order_quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE product_name LIKE '%keyboard%' ORDER BY order_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reorder_points WHERE demand_variability > 50;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND product_name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT rp.product_id, rp.lead_time_days, p.product_name FROM reorder_points rp JOIN products p ON rp.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;

SELECT rp.product_id, l.days_in_transit, d.demand_mean FROM lead_time l JOIN reorder_points rp ON l.product_id = rp.product_id JOIN demand_variability d ON rp.product_id = d.product_id WHERE l.days_in_transit > 5 AND d.demand_mean > 50;

SELECT p.product_name, rp.lead_time_days, l.days_in_transit, d.demand_mean FROM products p JOIN reorder_points rp ON p.product_id = rp.product_id JOIN lead_time l ON p.product_id = l.product_id JOIN demand_variability d ON p.product_id = d.product_id ORDER BY d.demand_mean ASC, p.product_name;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM reorder_points;
SELECT id, reorder_point FROM product_reorder;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT lead_time_days, product_id FROM lead_times WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT demand_variation_pct FROM demand_variability WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM reorder_points WHERE reorder_point > 50 ORDER BY demand_variability DESC, lead_time ASC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM products WHERE id IN (SELECT product_id FROM demand_variability WHERE demand_variation_pct > 0.2);
SELECT product_id, reorder_point FROM product_reorder WHERE product_id IN (SELECT id FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%');
SELECT rp.id, rp.reorder_point, lt.lead_time_days FROM reorder_points rp JOIN lead_times lt ON rp.id = lt.product_id WHERE rp.id < 100;
SELECT * FROM reorder_points rp LEFT JOIN product_reorder pr ON rp.id = pr.product_id WHERE rp.lead_time > 5 AND pr.reorder_point < 100 ORDER BY rp.id ASC, pr.reorder_point DESC;
